name: Mission Planning and Execution
description: Comprehensive training in planning and executing high-stakes special operations missions.

cards.title: Developing Mission Blueprints
cards.description: Creating a structured plan for executing covert and high-risk operations.
cards.bulletpoints: Objective assessment, risk mitigation, contingency planning
cards.summaryText: Draft mission blueprints that clarify objectives, map risks, and bake in layered contingencies before teams step off.

cards.title: Team Coordination and Execution
cards.description: Executing missions with precise team-based coordination and dynamic adaptability.
cards.bulletpoints: Command hierarchy, rapid decision-making, mission flow adjustments
cards.summaryText: Rehearse command hierarchies and rapid comms so operators adapt on the fly while keeping mission flow tight.
